remarks: The law of concretion.  Theorem 9.5 of [Quine] p. 61.  (Contributed by NM, 28-May-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)
statement:
opelopabg.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
opelopabg.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
opelopabg $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ( <. A , B >. e. { <. x , y >. | ph } <-> ch ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ch x y $.
